docs.snippet: The ban on away fans of Dutch giants Ajax Amsterdam and Feyenoord Rotterdam attending games between the two sides will not be lifted when they meet in their next two games, the mayors of the two cities said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The ban on away fans of Dutch giants Ajax Amsterdam and Feyenoord Rotterdam attending games between the two sides will not be lifted when they meet in their next two games, the mayors of the two cities said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Away Fans Ban to Remain for Ajax-Feyenoord Clashes
